meanings.definition: A group of six lines in a sonnet.
meanings.sent1: In the poem, the sestet beautifully concluded the sonnet.
meanings.sent2: The poet crafted a lovely sestet to finish the sonnet.
meanings.sent3: The sestet in the sonnet made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her words danced like a sestet in the sonnet.
meanings.sent5: The sestet painted a vivid picture in the sonnet.

meanings.definition: The last six lines of a Petrarchan sonnet.
meanings.sent1: The sestet brought closure to the Petrarchan sonnet.
meanings.sent2: He carefully composed the sestet for the Petrarchan sonnet.
meanings.sent3: The sestet in the Petrarchan sonnet added a twist.
meanings.sent4: The sestet was a beacon of light in the Petrarchan sonnet.
meanings.sent5: With the sestet, the Petrarchan sonnet reached its peak.
